subject: Email Already Exists
headline: Login to Your Account
body2: It appears that an account with your email address already exists.
body3: If you are trying to create a new account and received this message, it means you already have an account with us. Please log in using the link below:
body4: If you have forgotten your password, you can reset it using the 'Forgot Password' option after clicking on the login link. Please ignore this email if you did not attempt to create a new account or reset a password.
